name: Acid Girls' Escape
storyline: Figure out the shortest route, including the placement of items, by understanding the structure of the building and the number of steps to be taken. You can roll back in 10 steps, so don't be afraid to make mistakes.
summary: The third installment of the "Yabatanien" series, a multi-end escape game in which eight girls are placed in a critical situation and must be rescued.
